title: Frozen Prince Mundo
body: I'm sorry if this is a stupid question. But when one buys the Frozen Prince Mundo Icon/Boarder pack , does that mean you get the skin too?

replies.body:
Hey SavagM3,

If you're talking about the **Border for Frozen Prince Mundo + Icon** from the Snowdown Token Store under the Loot tab, then no; it only the border and the icon. If you're referring to the **Frozen Prince Mundo Set** under the Store tab which includes the skin, champion, ward skin, icon, and 5 chromas, then yes.

https://imgur.com/7LaR29o

I hope this helps!
Ty. I am not the most savvy when it comes to computers or anything related; but I am thankful for anyone ready to offer up help. Be well.
